mapper.select: select offline_num from ll_wechat_user where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update ll_wechat_user set offline_num = #{num} where id=#{id}
update ll_wechat_user set parentId = #{parentId} where openid=#{openid}
mapper.delete: delete from ll_wechat_user_qrcode where openId=#{openId} and senceCode = #{senceCode} and senceId = #{senceId}
mapper.update: update ll_wechat_user set last_access_time = #{last_access_time} where openid = #{openid}
update ll_wechat_user set expire_date=#{expire_date},status=0 where id in (${ids})
mapper.select: select openId from user where userId=#{userId}
select id from ll_wechat_user where openid=#{openId}
select parentid from ll_wechat_user where openid=#{openId}
select count(*) from ll_wechat_user where parentid=#{parentId}
select count(*) from ll_wechat_user where parentid =#{id} and create_time>=#{startTime} and create_time <#{endTime}
select * from ll_wechat_user u where u.last_access_time >= #{startDate} and u.last_access_time <= #{endDate}
